uiLanguage.title: UI Language
uiLanguage.description: Select the language for the application interface

speechLanguage.title: Language
speechLanguage.description: Select the language for speech recognition. Auto will automatically determine the language, while selecting a specific language can improve accuracy for that language.
speechLanguage.autoDetect: Parakeet model automatically detects the language. No manual selection is needed.

pushToTalk.title: Push To Talk
pushToTalk.description: Hold to record, release to stop

audioFeedback.title: Audio Feedback
audioFeedback.description: Play sound when recording starts and stops

outputDevice.title: Output Device
outputDevice.description: Select your preferred output device for audio feedback

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Adjust the volume of audio feedback sounds

autoStart.title: Start with Windows
autoStart.description: Launch Handy automatically when Windows starts

startHidden.title: Start Hidden
startHidden.description: Start Handy minimized to system tray

translation.title: Auto-Translate to English
translation.description: Automatically translate transcribed text to English

shortcuts.title: Handy Shortcuts
shortcuts.pushToTalkDescription: Hold down the shortcut to record, release to stop
shortcuts.toggleRecordingDescription: Press the shortcut once to start recording, press again to stop

speaker.title: Speaker
speaker.description: Select your output device for audio feedback

model.title: Model
model.description: Select the transcription model to use

overlayPosition.title: Overlay Position
overlayPosition.description: Display visual feedback overlay during recording and transcription. On Linux 'None' is recommended.

alwaysOnMic.title: Always On Microphone
alwaysOnMic.description: Keep microphone active for low latency recording. This may prevent your computer from sleeping.

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode
offlineMode.description: Use local models only (no internet connection required)

startHidden.title: Start Hidden
startHidden.description: Launch to system tray without opening the window.

autostart.title: Launch on Startup
autostart.description: Automatically start Handy when you log in to your computer.

pasteMethod.title: Paste Method
pasteMethod.description: Ctrl+V: 'pastes' via ctrl+v. Direct: type text directly. Shift+Insert: pastes via shift+insert. None: skip paste; just update history/clipboard.

clipboardHandling.title: Clipboard Handling
clipboardHandling.description: Don't Modify Clipboard preserves your current clipboard contents after transcription. Copy to Clipboard leaves the transcription result in your clipboard after pasting.

translateToEnglish.title: Translate to English
translateToEnglish.description: Automatically translate speech from other languages to English during transcription.
translateToEnglish.notSupported: Translation is not supported by the {model} model.

modelUnload.title: Unload Model
modelUnload.description: Automatically free GPU/CPU memory when the model hasn't been used for the specified time

customWords.title: Custom Words
customWords.description: Add words that are often misheard or misspelled during transcription. The system will automatically correct similar-sounding words to match your list.

debug.title: Debug Settings
debug.titleDescription: These settings are for debugging purposes only

debugMode.title: Debug Mode
debugMode.description: Enable debug mode for advanced troubleshooting

about.title: About
about.description: Handy is a free and open source speech-to-text application
about.whisperCppDescription: High-performance inference of OpenAI's Whisper automatic speech recognition model
about.whisperCppDetails: Handy uses Whisper.cpp for fast, local speech-to-text processing. Thanks to the amazing work by Georgi Gerganov and contributors.

history.title: History
history.noTranscriptions: No transcriptions yet. Start recording to build your history!
history.deleteEntryFailed: Failed to delete entry. Please try again.

errors.microphoneAccess: Microphone access denied. Please check your system settings.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.modelDownloadFailed: Model download failed. Please try again.
